data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
XML::Database is a native XML Database in Perl. It will allow for
    development and maintenance of XML data in a database repository. It
    will act as a real RDBMS and have a remote server functionalities,
    command line interface, and a DBI like interface through
    XML::Database as well as an upcomming DBD driver for DBI.
